name: knight (Pocket_Fun)
description:
Fight hoards of enemies and bosses as a heroically daring knight.  

In this 2d platform fighter, you fight off wave after wave of enemies, and bosses. In hope to free the land! Test yourself, and see how long you can last.

Disclaimer: This game is unfinished at the moment, and I am only making it accessible as an html5 file for testing and ease of use. When I fully release it, it will be for mobile. 

Please note: "knight" is not the name of the game, but a place holder until I come up with one.
